org.araneaframework.http
Interface HttpOutputData

All Superinterfaces:
Extendable, Narrowable, OutputData
All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardServletOutputData
public interface HttpOutputData
extends OutputData

Provides methods to deal with the manipulate low-level HTTP constructs. Wraps the HttpServletResponse.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@webmedia.ee)
See Also:
HttpInputData

Method Detail

encodeURL

String encodeURL(String url)
Encodes the URL to include some additional information (e.g. HTTP session identifier). Note that Aranea may include some information not present in the servlet spec.

encodeRedirectURL

String encodeRedirectURL(String url)
Encodes the redirect URL to include some additional information (e.g. HTTP session identifier). Note that Aranea may include some information not present in the servlet spec.

Since:
1.2.3

sendRedirect

void sendRedirect(String location)
                  throws IOException
Sends an HTTP redirect to a specified location URL.

Throws:
IOException

getOutputStream

OutputStream getOutputStream()
                             throws IOException
Returns an OutputStream that can be used to write to response. Note that unlike the Servlet specification, Aranea permits to use stream and writer interchangeably.

Throws:
IOException

getWriter

PrintWriter getWriter()
                      throws IOException
Returns a PrintWriter that can be used to write to response. Note that unlike the Servlet specification, Aranea permits to use stream and writer interchangeably.

Throws:
IOException

setContentType

void setContentType(String type)
Sets the MIME content type of the output. May include the charset, e.g. "text/html; charset=UTF-8".

getCharacterEncoding

String getCharacterEncoding()
Returns the character encoding used to write out the response.

setCharacterEncoding

void setCharacterEncoding(String encoding)
Sets the character encoding used to write out the response.

getLocale

Locale getLocale()
Returns the locale associated with the response.
